```{r, echo=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
# Loading in data to explore

# NPP
npp <- read.csv("Biomass/NPP_combined_MISSING4.csv")

npp <- npp %>%
  mutate(
    Inoculation = factor(Inoculation),
    Polyculture = factor(Polyculture),
    Group = interaction(Inoculation, Polyculture, sep = "_")
  )


```
